verified.description: Indicates whether the user's email has been verified.

definition.description: Stores user profiles. Path-based ownership enables simple security rules based on `request.auth.uid`. The 'userId' parameter is the Firebase Authentication UID.

params.name: userId
params.description: The Firebase Authentication UID of the user.

definition.description: Stores scripture entries. Each document represents a scripture. Supports secure list operations due to homogeneous security posture.

firestore.reasoning: The Firestore structure is designed to manage users and scriptures within the Cosmic Scriptures Explorer application. User data is stored in a dedicated `users` collection, with each document representing a user. This ensures path-based ownership and simplifies security rules for user-specific data. Scripture data is stored in a `scriptures` collection, facilitating easy querying and management of scripture entries. This structure avoids hierarchical authorization dependencies, improving security rule simplicity and debuggability. It also supports robust `list` operations for scriptures, as all documents in the `scriptures` collection share the same security requirements.
